blocks.title: DevOps
blocks.description: Learn about various DevOps tools, including Git, Jenkins, Docker, Ansible, Terraform, Kubernetes, Prometheus, and Grafana

blocks.title: SRE
blocks.description: Learn about principles and practices that supports software delivery - keeping production systems stable and still delivering new features at speed.

blocks.title: Web Development
blocks.description: Learn to create a complete e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node and SQL.
